data.author: MicroByte

changelog.release_notes: Adjustments
My old Webhosting platform no longer works, hopefully this one does.  Sorry for the inconvenience!
* Bug fixes, cleaned up Time Steps/battery section to make it uniform.
Bug Corrections and new option for not showing the zero on hours.

* Fixed a battery reporting bug
* Added ability to select start day of week (Sunday or Monday)
* Adding customization's that no one asked for! Now you can add/remove all items on the face that you want to keep or just don't really care for.
* Sometimes you just don't need to have things vibrate... Bluetooth vibrate is now configurable.

* Now supports - English, French, Italian, German and Spanish.
* Changed first day of the week to be Monday.
People don't like bikes...  Bike has been replaced...
Fixed issue with month/year going off face.
* Added Pebble OG Support
Initial Release

data.description:
*** Now supports - English, French, Italian, German and Spanish ***


Nothing Special - a simple, digital watch face with the basics to get you through your day.  

Features:

* Color Customization - Sorry, I can only make your world either Black or White, so please only where a Tux from now on and have a penguin as a pet
* Feature Customization - keep or remove the display of weather, day, date, steps, battery - all independently removable!
* Weather - For those trapped in solitary confinement and have no way to look outside, now you can keep up with the latest that Mother Nature throws at you
* Time, Day, Date - Well, it's a watch after all...
* Bluetooth Monitor - *BZZZT*, you've left your phone in the restroom again...
* Steps - you put your left foot in, you take your left foot out.  Now do that 10,000 times and you're done for the day
* Battery - Smashing through the boundaries, Lunacy has found me, Cannot stop the battery...

Nothing Special has a Battery Grade of "A" which according to Pebble means: "Excellent! Nothing Special has a minimal impact on battery life. You're the best! Keep up the good work."  

The best Jerry, the best!

As always, please <3 to show your support.  Watch faces are free, and hearts keep us motivated!
data.title: Nothing Special

data.description:
Inspired by the aesthetics of vintage 24-hour timepieces, this watch face also leverages aspects of the Pebble:

(1) The hour hand sits above the minute hand so that it is always visible (see second image).

(2) The hour hand snaps to the next position at the top of the hour and does not smoothly transition through the hour. (e.g. the second image shows 10:57, not 09:57)

(3) The date lives in the center of the watchface.

(4) The subtle change in background color reflects (approximately) daytime and nightime.

latest_release.release_notes:
Slight visual tweaks:
-- Aligned "23" dot to "13" dot
-- Added border around date

Initial release

data.description:
World time clock for Pebble Time and Round. 3 color themes to choose from. Configurable for 35+ cities/time zones, including half-hour offset zones.  Online manual is provided (tap website link below).

Supports 3 favorite time zones. Cycle through the 3 favorites with a flick of the wrist, no need to use the phone to switch between favorite timezones.

Other features:
Supports 12/24 hour local clock
Weather icon with temperature in C or F (local weather)
Moon phase display
Battery load indicator
Local sunrise and sunset time
Days of week in English, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Spanish and Klingon.
A-Grade energy friendly (extremely low battery usage).
BT disconnect warning (temp goes red with optional vibration)
Keeps track of DST and timezone date
DST on dual time can be set to Automatic (US), On or Off.

This watchface comes with a bonus Watch App. Completely configurable from your wrist! The app includes an on-board compass. 

Both watchface and app for just $2,99 ! Download the watch app separately from the Pebble Store.
data.title: World Stripes

data.author: ourLivez llc

changelog.release_notes: Animated activity rings
Added bright green segment for over achievers + Larger font for the step counter + A few other minor layout adjustments
Initial release

data.description:
Elegant analog watch with rings for sleep time & steps walked, indicators for date, the step counter, the battery level and the Bluetooth connection status.

The outer ring shows when you were asleep and when you were in deep sleep (the darker blue segments).

The inner ring shows steps walked in green, delta to average in red (if you are behind), or as a yellow dot if you are ahead. Bright green for steps over your goal.
data.title: Analog Health

data.description:
This watchface is for Pebblers in the USA and Canada only.
(Pebblers in Europe, please check out EU DualTime).

Besides the local time, date and weather (temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius), this watchface also shows your home time as a dual time when you travel to a different timezone. And no hassle, this watchface auto adjusts to summer and wintertime. Never call home at an awkward moment again!

Shake your wrist to show seconds in stead of the date (see settings). Futhermore an attention signal and icon, when bluetooth connection with your phone is lost.

The background colour of the local time indicates the battery level. Up to and above 30% green, up to 20% orange and less than 20% red.

After downloading this watchface, go to settings (in the Pebble app on your phone) to set your home timezone and your temperature preference.

If you like it, heart it ;-)

latest_release.release_notes:
New layout.

Option to switch off seconds in date field.

data.title: USA DualTime

changelog.release_notes: Initial release

data.description:
Simple watchface with square pixel-perfect font with time and date.
Completely configurable. You can configure:
- time and date font sizes
- date on/off
- time and date background color
- bluetooth connection vibration alarm
- bluetooth status icon (only when disconnected)
- battery icon (off, on 10%, on 10% and 20% with different icons)
- date format
- Croatian localisaton (this one is for myself)

support for oldschool B/W Pebble and Pebble Time (Square).
No Pebble Round support yet.
As I only have original B/W Pebble, I only tested color features in emulator, so I apologize for any bugs that I missed. I hope color features look nice.
data.title: Simple Square

data.description:
This watchface features Gen 6 sprites! Included in this version are Mega Asbol, Lanturn, Azumarill, and Luxray. Shake to animate each sprite for 10 seconds.

With the release of sun and moon, gen 7 sprites can also be added! Feel free to let me know if you would like this watchface with new Pokemon.

Due to limitations of the Pebble software, manual changes are required to change Pokemon. Find the code on Github to make your own personal watch, or feel free to email me for directions. If you can't seem to figure it out, email me with the 4 pokemon you would like, and I can send you a PBW file which you can load onto your watch.

Thanks to pkparaso for hosting sprites

Github link: https://github.com/a-spo/AnimatedDex

latest_release.release_notes:
First Full Release

Rotate between four animations. Shake to animate. Linked to github

Support for Pebble Time 2!  It's like the previous version found a mushroom!

Support for Quick View notifications.  See Mario jumping when notifications arrive.
Moved configuration page to new site
The configuration page added last release now shows the values you saved for steps or miles

Several users requested the ability to override the default 3.4 miles so this release proudly introduces...Game Genie mode!

There is now a configuration page where you can specify your daily goal in either miles or steps.  Enter a zero for either to go back to the default.
Better formatting for Round
Initial release

data.description:
How far would you make it through the Mushroom Kingdom in a day?  Download the Steps with Mario watchface and find out!

This uses Pebble Health tracking to tell what level you're in thanks to screenshots from Ian Albert and the distance calculated from Nick Greene.

Can you make it 3.4 miles to save the princess?

Includes date, time and battery level as indicated by the coin count.

UPDATE: Plug in your Game Genie and customize the length of the Mushroom Kingdom.  See release notes for details!

latest_release.release_notes:
Support for Pebble Time 2!  It's like the previous version found a mushroom!

Support for Quick View notifications.  See Mario jumping when notifications arrive.

data.author: Gomez Games

changelog.release_notes: Added HR when available.
Corrected communication startup
Corrected weather text flashing
Added pebble 2
Corrected sleep sum before midnight, initial language selection, weather update on IOS phones, and text display on round watchfaces.

Installed workaround for firmware compass problem. Corrected sleep and step history routine. Corrected display of Saturday text. Made weather update only update every 30 minutes instead of when the program restarted.
Compass has been reported as unstable in firmware 4. Disabled compass until it is fixed.
Reverted to old event handling
Modified initial load of weather data. Made language initialize to English.
Modified order of deinit functions
Revamped Kiezelpay event handler
Modified code to handle multiple threads
Corrected string manipulation problems that had been causing buffer overruns. Changed event handling to using pebble-events library
delayed event subscriptions till app has focus
Reordered init and deinit for cleaner stop and start
Chasing crashes after rev 4. Preventing rendering on load until watchface has focus. Made changes to communications.
Made various changes to make ILC compatible with rev 4
Corrected major problem with configuration communication
Cleaned up communication between phone and watch. Deleted some direct string manipulation that seemed to be crashing the watch.
Working on stability and size. Moved much of the processing to the phone. Streamlined the communication between watch and phone.

data.description:
Analog / Digital combination watch. 
ILuvChrono shows sunrise & sunset, also weather, health (charted steps & sleep), and hours slept. 
It includes a compass too. Because of the animated nature of this watch, the display is optimized to increase battery life. 
ILuvChrono is powered by KiezelPay.
data.title: ILuvChrono

changelog.release_notes:
1.2
- adjusted position of bluetooth and battery icons

1.1
- modified position of percent and digitalclock.
- tidied up code to remove error messages for the app timer.

Simple and minimalistic watchface.
Einfaches minimalistisches Zifferblatt.

Features:
- Colour support for pebble time / time steel (red hour hand).
- Bluetooth Connection gain/loss vibration and icon.
- Battery low icon (displayed when battery charge percent is 10 or lower).
- Battery charging indicator icon.
- Displays digital time and battery percent on shake/tap for 2 seconds.

+ Untersttzt Farbigen Stundenzeiger auf pebble time / time steel (in Rot).
+ Bluetooth Verbindungsstatusindikator ber Vibration und Icon.
+ Icon fr niedrigen Akkustand (10% oder weniger).
+ Akkuladeindikator Icon.
+ Bei Schtteln/Tappen wird der aktuelle Ladestand des Akkus und eine digitale Uhrzeitanzeige fr 2 Sekunden eingeblendet.

Enjoy!

data.description:
Simple and minimalistic watchface.
Einfaches minimalistisches Zifferblatt.

Features:
- Colour support for pebble time / time steel (red hour hand). 
- Bluetooth Connection gain/loss vibration and icon. 
- Battery low icon (displayed when battery charge percent is 10 or lower).
- Battery charging indicator icon. 
- Displays digital time and battery percent on shake/tap for 4 seconds. 

+ Untersttzt Farbigen Stundenzeiger auf pebble time / time steel (in Rot). 
+ Bluetooth Verbindungsstatusindikator ber Vibration und Icon. 
+ Icon fr niedrigen Akkustand (10% oder weniger). 
+ Akkuladeindikator Icon. 
+ Bei Schtteln/Tappen wird der aktuelle Ladestand des Akkus und eine digitale Uhrzeitanzeige fr 4 Sekunden eingeblendet. 

Enjoy!

data.title: Zeiteisen

data.author: JL

changelog.release_notes:
- NEW: Now using Clay.js on latest configuration. Offline configuration is now supported.
- Added battery and date toggles on the configuration page.
- No longer subscribes to TickTimerService
Minor fixes

- Made time more visible
- Fixed multiple weather requests every time a tap occurs; now only requests once per minute despite multiple taps.
- Changed designed to layer hiding to window pushing and popping.
- Various fixes
- Removed extraneous Font resouce

- Battery icon replaced with Battery percentage again. It's more accurate and thus more tactical.
- Introduced Settings which allows users to configure the watch
- Settings: Bluetooth indicator setting. Enable to have Pebble vibrate if connected via Bluetooth.
- Settings: Weather. Enable the watch to fetch from Forecast.IO using current location.
- Settings: Forecast.io API key. Required to enable the weather. Get your free key here: https://developer.forecast.io/
- Settings: Celsius/Fahrenheit. Toggles temperature units used.

- Added on-demand vibration; Pebble vibrates if connected to Bluetooth
- Removed charging indicator and battery percentage and replaced with icon. Reason: detailed battery information is provided by the Settings menu icon and other trackers such as Battery+.
- Information on flick now stays up for 8 Seconds, covering the maximum time the back light is on.
- Moved battery information to the top. 
- Slated to add Apparent Temperature and Condition on the bottom on next release.
Adjusted information position

- Removed battery label. A "+" sign indicates charging state.
- Date line adapts to 24-HOUR Format and removes extraneous AM/PM.
- Rename Short Name to "FOD"

Based on the watchface Time on Demand, which is based on NightFace.
Information is compact, aligned neater, uses Frutiger font family.

Updates time with a flick of the wrist and disappears after five seconds.

Tested on Chalk, but should work with others.

data.description:
Based on Nightface with a couple modifications. 

Wake up the CPU on demand with a flick of the wrist.

Provides Time, Date, Battery level, Bluetooth indicator, and Weather via forecast.io.

Useful with Standby-Mode during bedtime or if you just want to save battery.


Features:
- NEW: All complications' visibility can now be toggled!
- NEW: Support for upcoming pebble Clay JS. Offline Configuration is now supported.
- All complications are updated and displayed on demand, saving CPU cycles.
- A forecast.io API key is required for the weather feature.
- Weather is pulled based on current location and fetches Apparent Temperature (feels like) and Conditions.
- Toggle Celsius/Fahrenheit caters to both Imperial and Metric users.
- Toggle Bluetooth indicators. On flick, vibrate if the watch is not connected to the phone.


Hardware tested on:
- Chalk.

latest_release.release_notes:
- NEW: Now using Clay.js on latest configuration. Offline configuration is now supported.
- Added battery and date toggles on the configuration page.
- No longer subscribes to TickTimerService

data.title: Frutiger On Demand

data.description:
Display the current time and your FAVORITE QUOTES/PHRASES from the authors you love, right in your watch. Just add your favorite quotes and the watchface will display it in a nice way.

The Time&Quotes watchface also includes a calendar to display the current month when you shake your arm.

Features:

  * Battery dots to display battery status.
  * Configurable 12/24 Hours Display.
  * Current Month calendar.
  * Automatically refresh quotes.

Please report any bug or error. Also any suggestion will be welcome.

data.description:
The pink ball of fun has made it to the Pebble smartwatch! Based on the GBA title Kirby Nightmare in Dreamland.

Features
--Animated Kirby--
6 Animations, Randomly selected and plays each hour, shake the watch to play the animation.

--Weather--
The current temperature will be displayed when the watch is shaken in place of the date. Kirby's Bosses update based on the current weather condition. Weather is based on either GPS or you can enter in the City. Weather requires a free API key from Openweathermap.org.

--Step Goal--
Set a step goal for yourself, the bosses health bar will diminish as you get closer to your goal.

--Bluetooth Indicator--
If your watch becomes disconnected from your phone your watch will vibrate and a special boss will appear.

--Background Color Change--
Through out the day the background color will change. Morning 5am, Day 12pm, Afternoon 5pm, and Night 9pm.

--Battery Life--
Kirby's life bar will reflect the current battery charge for your watch.

--12 and 24 Hour Mode--

If you enjoy this watchface please plant a big ol' heart, I hope you enjoy this as much as I did creating it.

-Game Time

latest_release.release_notes: Weather now requires a free API Key from Openweathermap.org.

data.title: Kirby GT

data.description:
If you're craving the nostalgia of Pokemon Ruby, Sapphire, and Emerald, then Pokemon RSE Watchface is just for you. With over 30 Pokemon changing every half hour, experience your favorite game on your wrist! Shake your wrist to change the battle, and now with Round support!

Pokemon are displayed randomly based on the current level. In addition to displaying Pokemon, the watch also shows the time, weather conditions, current temperature, charging status, bluetooth status, and daily step goal progress.
      Your Pokemon's level-battery percentage
      Your Pokemon's HP bar-battery level
      Opponent Pokemon's level-current temperature
      Opponent Pokemon's health-time left in day
      Background-weather conditions
           Gray-cloudy, rain-rainy, snow-snowing, grass-clear, blank-other
      Charging status-PAR status condition
      Bluetooth connection status-SLP status condition
      EXP bar is % progress towards daily step goal
      See http://i.imgur.com/1pJQGn0.png for a detailed explanation

****Note: In order to use this watch face, an API key from Weather Underground is required. This can be generated for free from https://www.wunderground.com/weather/api/d/login.html****

If you enjoy this watchface please give it a heart! It's good feedback for me so I know it's something everyone enjoys. That way I know to keep making it better and better.

latest_release.release_notes:
Added a fixed location option for weather
Fixed a couple sprites

data.title: Pokemon RSE

data.author: Der Bastler

changelog.release_notes: Bug fixes.

data.description:
Do you prefer nice pics over weather & health data on your watch face, but want forecast on your wrist as well? Palma Watch brings the best of both worlds. :) Shaking your hand brings all important weather data (icons for each 6 hours of next one and half day, current temperature [C], low and high temperature of next 24 hours, atmospheric pressure compared to normal, humidity, Beaufort scale and wind direction, sunrise and sunset) from OpenWeatherMap as well as location and weather info time stamp (to check if you have current data). After returning to clock, you find a new picture smiling at you. 
In top right corner two horizontal bars show battery charge and your progress toward 5000-step daily goal, respectively. A running shoe appears when goal reached and 'STEP' vibrates in Morse code.  Losing Bluetooth connection prompts vibration of 'B' in Morse code, and BT pic appears. Getting extreme weather conditions prompts 'SOS' Morse code vibration. 
The 10,000-step goal seems arbitrary, but take into consideration, that Pebble Health has limitations: a/ counts perfectly the number of steps during walks, b/ seriously underestimates steps during jogging or running, c/ overestimates steps in vibrating environment (false positive reading during driving or traveling, doing handiwork). Altogether, 10,000 steps measured by Pebble Health corresponds a healthy daily walk.
data.title: Palma Watch

data.description:
This is a Practical Watchface. The face is elegant but practical with easy to read text. From top to bottom are an activity monitor, the daily steps, date, time, weather, battery percent and distance walked.

Configuration options include:
Date in WDay, Month Day or WDay, Day Month
Time in 12 or 24 hr Format
Temperature in Celcius or Fahrenheit
Distance in Kilometers or Miles
Daily steps goal (6000 is the default, 0 turns it off).
Colors

When bluetooth disconnects a red icon appears in the upper right.

The battery line changes color based on the percent left (green, yellow, red).

The activity monitor appears in the upper left.
red Z = not nearly enough steps (not active)
orange x = a little movement but still not enough
(blank) = normal activity (you could reach your goal if you sustained this level of activity)
green a = active (pat yourself on the back)
cyan A = more active (woo!)
white ! = even more active (nosebleed!)
Activity is based on steps goal (6000 is the default) over a 10 hour period or 50 steps every 5 minutes.  Less than 50 steps every five minutes will show a Z.  The idea is that if you see a red Z, you should get up and walk around.  Activity data is based only on the past hour (So previous hours from the past hour do not count. So each hour you have to get up and move even if you did a lot of steps in a previous hour.  Even if you reach your goal early, you still have to move every hour.)  It is suggested to start with a low number of steps (like 2 or 4,000) and work your way up (10,000 would be great!) with 6000 being the default.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed a problem with the smaller date.  Fixed a problem with weather update after disconnect from bluetooth and reconnect.

data.title: Practical Watchface

data.description:
This watchface is for Pebblers in Europe only.
(Pebblers in the USA and Canada, please check out USA DualTime).

Besides the local time, date and weather (temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit), this watchface also shows the time in your home country as a dual time when you travel to a different timezone. And no hassle, this watchface auto adjusts to summer and wintertime. A must-have for the holidays. Never call home at an awkward moment again!

Shake your wrist to show seconds in stead of the date (see settings). Futhermore an attention signal and icon, when bluetooth connection with your phone is lost.

The background colour of the local time indicates the battery level. Up to and above 30% green, up to 20% orange and less than 20% red.

After downloading this watchface, go to settings (in the Pebble app on your phone) to set your home country and your temperature preference (Celsius or Fahrenheit).

If you like it, heart it ;-)

latest_release.release_notes:
New layout.

Option to switch on/off seconds in date field after shaking wrist.

data.title: EU DualTime

Planetarium. The solar system on your wrist! Gives an overview of the relative position of the 6 inner planets around the sun. Mercury, Venus, Earth (blue and larger for easy recognition, 3rd rock from the Sun), Mars, Jupiter and Saturn. 

With demo mode, shows the planets position in increments of five days per second from today on.

New: Theme selection. Select your preferred theme background: Zodiac, Milky Way or Dark Stars.

Sunrise and sunset time provided. BT connection warning with configurable buzz. 12/24 hour clock supported.

$1.99 only. The watchface comes with a free 24-hour trial.

data.author: amyjchen

changelog.release_notes:
First version of Vibes.

The minutes are expressed with four vibrations, three of short and one long. The placement of the long vibration signals the minutes. The minutes are followed by a long pause and then vibrations of equal length, one for each hour: 

So if the time is 3:45, it's signaled as follows: short, short, short, long, pause. one, two, three. 

THE MINUTES ARE AS FOLLOWS: 
XX:00 long, short, short, short. 
XX:15 short, long, short, short. 
XX:30 short, short, long, short. 
XX:45 short, short, short, long. 

The hours are based on a 12-hour clock. 

The current version of the watchface starts at 8:00 am and ends at midnight.

The minutes are followed by a long pause and then vibrations of equal length, one for each hour. So if the time is 3:45, it's signaled as follows: short, short, short, long, pause. one, two, three. THE MINUTES ARE AS FOLLOWS: XX:00 : long, short, short, short; XX:15 : short, long, short, short; XX:30 : short, short, long, short; XX:45 : short, short, short, long. The hours are based on a 12-hour clock. The current version of the watchface starts at 8:00 am and ends at midnight.

data.author: jdixl

changelog.release_notes:
* Refined the animation that occurs when the time changes.
* Added a menu image to help identify the watch face.
Removed some beta features left in during testing.

Super readable digital watch face for all pebbles.

Highlights include:
* Numbers made up of different coloured patches (hence the name).
* Vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect.
* Day of the week and day of the month shown in the center.
* Animation when the time changes.

data.description:
Big bold numbers with a side of date!

Highlights include:
* Super readable digital time made up of different coloured patches (hence the name).
* Day of the week and day of the month shown in the centre.
* Vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect.
* Animation when the time changes.
